author: bionicle_madguy
title: Godly
review:
Here is a bionicle that stands taller than most bionicles but he is a bit fragile and unsteady

Pros

  • dudy staff
  • wicked sholders and chest
  • awesome mask
  • lots of rotating parts

Cons

  • fragile
  • un-stable

author: Matroxide
title: Takutanuva, AWSOME!
review: What is cooler than a great villain? A great villain combined with an awsome Toa! According to the Bionicle story, Takutanuva was created by the two falling into a mercury pool that was filled by energized protodermis. No one, aside from the Toa Nuva, had ever survived energized protodermis before. The result was remarkable, light and darkness had united as one being! Of course using the instructions inside, you can split Takutanuva into two sets, Takanuva with his Ussanui, and Makuta so you can play for hours with no end!
